CustomField.formula: IF( (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100, 2)) + '% (' + TEXT(LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsHeapSizeMax__c) + ')'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ✅ when 80% or less of the limit is used, ⚠️ when 80.1-89.9% is used, or ⛔ when 90% or more is used
CustomField.label: Heap Size
